head.title: Metro Briefing | New York: North Bellmore: Two Killed In Accident

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | New York: North Bellmore: Two Killed In Accident
hedline.hl2: North Bellmore, N.Y.: Two Killed in Accident

body.head.byline: By THOMAS J. LUECK; Compiled by John Sullivan

abstract.p: Juan Benitez and female passenger whose identity is not disclosed are killed when their car crashes near North Bellmore, NY; male passenger in car is injured (S)

block.p: Two people were killed and a third was critically injured when their Honda Accord careered off the Southern State Parkway near Newbridge Road in Nassau County just before 2:30 a.m. yesterday, according to the New York State Police. The driver, Juan Benitez, 22, of Brentwood, and a 16-year-old female front-seat passenger, whose identity was not disclosed, were pronounced dead at the scene, the police said. A 17-year-old male passenger, whose identity was also not disclosed, was ejected from the back seat and sustained a head injury. He was in critical condition late yesterday at Nassau University Medical Center in East Meadow, the police said. The cause of the accident remained under investigation yesterday, the police said.

He was in critical condition late yesterday at Nassau University Medical Center in East Meadow, the police said. The cause of the accident remained under investigation yesterday, the police said.
